mapper.sql: id, name, area_id, area_name, seating, minimum_amount, table_amount, seat_amount, special_type, is_enabled, status
mapper.select: SELECT tmt.id as id, tmt.name as name, tmt.area_id as areaId, tmt.area_name as areaName, tmt.seating as seating, tmt.minimum_amount as minimumAmount, tmt.table_amount as tableAmount, tmt.seat_amount as seatAmount, tmt.is_special as isSpecial, tmt.special_type as specialType, tmt.is_enabled as isEnabled, tmt.is_orderdish as isOrderdish, tmt.status as status, tmt.short_chain as shortChain from t_mtb_tables tmt LEFT JOIN t_mtb_areas tma on tmt.area_id = tma.id where 1=1 and tmt.status = 1 and tma.physical_store_id = #{store} and tmt.area_id = #{areas} and tmt.name like concat('%',#{tableName},'%')
SELECT id AS id, name AS name, is_headquarters AS isHeadquarters FROM t_mps_physical_store
mapper.update: update t_mtb_tables set status = 0 where id = #{tableId}
mapper.select: select id as id, physical_store_id as physicalStoreId, name as name, sort as sort, status as status from t_mtb_areas where physical_store_id = #{storeId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_mtb_tables (id, name, area_id, area_name, seating, minimum_amount, table_amount, seat_amount, special_type, is_enabled, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seating,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minimumAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tableAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seatAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{specialType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})

id,

short_chain,

mapper.update:
update t_mtb_tables
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seating = #{seating,jdbcType=INTEGER},
minimum_amount = #{minimumAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
table_amount = #{tableAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
seat_amount = #{seatAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
special_type = #{specialType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_enabled = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_orderdish = #{isOrderdish,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_special = #{isSpecial,jdbcType=TINYINT},
short_chain = #{shortChain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_mtb_tables set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seating = #{seating,jdbcType=INTEGER}, minimum_amount = #{minimumAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, table_amount = #{tableAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seat_amount = #{seatAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, special_type = #{specialType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_enabled = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
